Kiwi/Aussie currently living in Copenhagen. This is my personal website where I post monthly round-ups, photos, and various musings.

Most photos are protected with a [CC BY-NC 4.0 license](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/). If you're interested in using any for commercial purposes, feel free to get in touch at raph\[dot\]eisenhofer\[at\]gmail\[dot\]com

This website and its contents are AI-free, see [here for my statement on AI use](ai_statement.qmd).
